colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @036A *, ,(CES DBANG PHYOG TZI NA'I YUL GYI DGRA LHA CHEN PO KHAMS GSUM BDUD 'DUL SPRIN RING RGYAL POR GRAGS PA LA BSKANG BSHAGS GSOL MCHOD BYA TSUL 'DOD PA'I RE BA KUN BSKONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BSTAN @036B PA'I RTZA LAG CHEN PO DAM PA'I RANG BZHIN LHUN GRUB TU SHAR BA'I YIL KOG SAN MCHOG GI SPRUL PA'I SKU RIN PO CHEN NAS RGYAL CHEN 'DI NYID KYI BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL DANG BCAS BSKANG GSO SPYI'I 'GROS DANG MTHUN PA'I CHA TSAD PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES GSUNG GIS NAN CHEN BSKUL BA DANG DU BLANGS TE, ^ GRO BTZUN SNYOMS LAS PA NOM CHI MING RGAN MKHAN PO BSKAL BZANG BKRA SHIS RGYA MTSOS ^ RDO RJE 'CHANG DRIN CAN RTZA BA'I BLA MA RJE DHARMA BADZRA GYIS MDZAD PA'I RGYAL CHEN 'DI NYID KYI GSOL MCHOD LA KHUNGS SU BYA, DAM PA @037A *, ,GZHAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I 'JIG RTEN PA'I LHA'I MCHOD CHO GA KHA SHAS KYI 'GROS DANG SGO BSTUN NAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN RAB 'BYAMS PA KAL PA BHA DRA DZNY'A NAS BGYIS PA'O,, ,,)
